entry.tran: 免于受罚地;逃脱惩罚地
entry.def: If you say that someone got away scot-free, you are emphasizing that they escaped punishment for something that you believe they should have been punished for.

example.ex: Others who were guilty were being allowed to get off scot-free.
example.tran: 其他犯罪人员不予处罚。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
